dct_description_sm: AMS 2 Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section. G.S.G.S. no. 4379 United States. Army Map Service In upper left margin: Sicily 1:7,500. Lambert conical orthomorphic projection. Ancillary map: Environs of Siracursa (1:30,000)."Enlarged from 1/25,000 Italian map dated 1927. Revised from air photogarphs and intelligence reports up to 1942. Photolitographed by the Ordnance Survey, 1943." Relief shown by contours at 10 metres interval and rock drawings. Government Offices and Fscist Headquarters are located
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
